722741f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 100th Street
722741f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, at the S.E. corner of 100th Street, showing the
Home of Peter Doegler, which will soon be demolished to make way for a
large apartment house.
1925.
Brown Brothers.

722742f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 100th Street
722742f-a.text:
280 Riverside Drive, east side, from and including 100th Street,
showing the Firemen's Monument.
About 1925.
Irving Underhill.
NES ~205

1558090.title: Riverside Drive - West 100th Street
1558090.folder: Riverside Drive - West 100th Street, Manhattan, NY

722740f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 100th Street (West)
722740f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, north from W. 100th Street, show-
ing private dwellings on the east side of same that face
the North (Hudson) River.
About 1905
Views 1,2

722740f-b.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 100th Street (West)
722740f-b.text:
Riverside Drive, north from W. 100th Street, show-
ing private dwellings on the east side of same that face
the North (Hudson) River.
About 1905
Views 1,2
